name: DarrellDavisBlackandGreen
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Using that experience, we hope to move toward real progress for Black people. We will explore bridging the often two separate strategies of protest and economic development. We will draw on the movements of the sixties to help guide us today. BLM, the exploitation of Black voters by the Democratic Party, and the role of today's "Black political class," in stunting our progress will all be covered
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
